dct_title_s: Perigrinatie ofte Veertich-Iarige Reyse, der kinderen Israels uyt Egipten, door de Roode-Zee; mitsgaders de Woestyne tot int Beloofde Landt Canaan
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map reads: Uren-gaens ider injoudende 24 stadien dat is 3000 passen.
North oriented at 45Â° angle between top and right of sheet.
Decorative cartouches, descriptive text, compass rose, illustrations, including figure, ships and seamonster.
Shows Exodus and wanderings of children of Israel across Red Sea, Sinai, and to Jericho.
Inset map shows city plan: Eygentlycke asbeelding vant Leger Israels...
Appears in Visscher's series of maps for Dutch bibles.
